BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations.

Items.Title: Oversight - Optimizing the City Civil Service Exam System.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Optimizing the City Civil Service Exam System.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to establish a civil service ambassador program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of citywide administrative services to establish a civil service ambassador program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S.3062D/A.7503, raising the minimum wage annually by a percentage based on the rate of inflation and labor productivity.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Raising the minimum wage annually by a percentage based on the rate of inflation and labor productivity. (S.3062D/A.7503)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York State to offer civil service exams, training materials, and assistance, at all Department of Corrections and Community Supervision (DOCCS) facilities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS to offer civil service exams, training materials, and assistance, at all Department of Corrections and Community Supervision (DOCCS) facilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil service examinations for justice-involved individuals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Civil service exams in department of correction facilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to administering a public service corps program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Administering a public service corps program.
